about: Hi  I'm Malak Parmar! A passionate Software Engineer with a deep fascination for AI, machine learning, and computer vision. With five years of experience in agile full-stack product development, I've honed my skills in creating detailed, user-centric solutions and transitioning complex applications to micro frontends. My journey in technology is fueled by a constant curiosity and a keen eye for detail, driving me to continually explore new realms within AI, particularly in image and video analysis. Outside of programming, I immerse myself in the world of Anime and Movies, drawing inspiration from their rich visual effects. I like to sketch, paint and make digital art, checkout my Instagram. Also, as an avid gamer, I enjoy strategic challenges in Counter-Strike and Dota, which sharpen my decision-making skills and reflexes. Join me as we explore the cutting-edge advancements in technology and uncover the potential of AI together!
